what_matters.price_targets: Know the upside wall street sees

stockanalysis.what_it_has: After hours movers, pre-market data, clean interface

biopharmcatalyst.what_it_has: FDA dates, PDUFA deadlines, trial readouts
biopharmcatalyst.when_to_use: Before ANY biotech entry - know the catalyst dates
biopharmcatalyst.critical_rule: NEVER trade biotech without checking catalyst calendar

defense_contracts.when_to_use: Check when defense names spike - find out WHY

nuclear_regulatory.when_to_use: For uranium plays - licensing decisions, policy changes

commodity_prices.uranium: Check spot price correlation to UUUU/UEC

before_any_entry: 1. Check SEC EDGAR for recent filings (8-K, Form 4)
2. Check news - is there a catalyst? Is it FRESH or STALE?
3. Check volume - is it unusual? Why?
6. Know the thesis - WHY this trade?
7. Know the exit - WHEN do you sell?
on_volume_spike: 1. Check news FIRST - what caused it?
3. Check if sector is moving or just this name
5. THEN decide if entry makes sense
daily_routine: Pre-market: Check futures, overnight news, pre-market movers
Open: Watch first 15 minutes, note what's running
After hours: Check earnings, AH movers, plan tomorrow

trading_truths.description: What the brain KNOWS to be true from experience

momentum_is_real.truth: Momentum EXISTS. Things that are moving tend to keep moving.
momentum_is_real.nuance: 'Don't chase' is not ALWAYS right. Sometimes the chase IS the play.
momentum_is_real.the_real_rule: Don't chase WITHOUT a thesis. Don't chase LATE. But catching a move after it starts is valid.

examples.MRNO: Caught after it started running. Up 111%. Chasing WORKED.
examples.IBRX: Entered on volume spike. Up 55%. Momentum was the signal.
examples.RDW: Entered on contract news. Up 30%. The news WAS the catalyst to chase.

when_chasing_works: Early in the move (day 1-2, not day 5)
Sector is hot (rotation into the space)
when_chasing_fails: Late in the move (already up 50%+ in a week)
You don't know WHY it's running

losing_once_is_not_forever.truth: One loss does not predict the next trade. Each trade is independent.
losing_once_is_not_forever.danger: Letting losses make you scared prevents winning.

example.DNN: Lost 3.78%, then it ran 6.49%. The loss was wrong, not the thesis.
example.lesson: We panic sold. The setup was right. We just didn't hold.

losing_once_is_not_forever.the_real_lesson: Analyze WHY you lost. If the thesis was wrong, learn. If execution was wrong, fix it. Don't stop trading.

ratios_matter_more_than_individuals.truth: Win rate and risk/reward ratio matter more than any single trade.

math.example_1: Win 60% of trades, average win +15%, average loss -10% = PROFITABLE
math.example_2: Win 40% of trades, average win +30%, average loss -10% = STILL PROFITABLE
math.the_point: You can be wrong more than half the time and still make money IF your winners are bigger than losers

current_stats.lesson: Thesis-driven trading has BETTER ratios. That's math, not opinion.

ratios_matter_more_than_individuals.tracking_requirement: Log EVERY trade with entry, exit, gain/loss to calculate real ratios over time

test_everything.truth: Don't accept trading wisdom without testing it yourself.

day_1_continuation.lesson: The claim was WRONG. We tested, we know.

buy_after_10pct_pop.lesson: Another broken rule we now know to ignore.

wounded_prey.claim: Stocks down 30%+ with volume spikes = opportunity

test_everything.principle: If someone tells you a rule, ASK: have you tested it? Show me the data.

things_people_say_that_arent_always_true: 'Cut losses fast' - sometimes the thesis needs time
'Don't fight the trend' - counter-trend can work with catalysts
conventional_wisdom_is_often_wrong.our_approach: Question everything. Test it. Keep what works for US.

nothing_is_wasted.principle: Every conversation adds intelligence. Every trade teaches something.
nothing_is_wasted.even_losses: Losses teach more than wins if we analyze them.
nothing_is_wasted.even_passes: Knowing what NOT to trade is as valuable as knowing what to trade.

market_truths_learned.description: Hard lessons from real trading, not textbooks

the_market_doesnt_care.truth: Your thesis can be RIGHT and you can still lose money.
the_market_doesnt_care.reason: Timing matters. Other factors matter. Liquidity matters.
the_market_doesnt_care.response: Accept this. Manage risk. Don't take it personally.

information_has_a_shelf_life.truth: Catalysts get priced in. Old news is useless.
information_has_a_shelf_life.example: DNN - CNSC hearing was December 11. We traded on 'hearing coming' in January.
information_has_a_shelf_life.rule: ALWAYS verify catalyst dates. 'Any day' is a red flag.

volume_tells_the_truth.signal: Big move + big volume = real. Big move + no volume = fake/temporary.

small_accounts_have_advantages.truth: We can enter and exit positions institutions can't touch.
small_accounts_have_advantages.why: A $1M fund can't buy $50 worth of a $3 stock. We can.
small_accounts_have_advantages.our_edge: Small caps, low float, names too small for big money = our hunting ground.

thesis_beats_everything.truth: Trades with thesis: 85.7% win. Trades without: 0% win.
thesis_beats_everything.this_is_not_opinion: This is our actual data from real trading.

continuous_improvement.description: How the brain gets smarter over time
daily: Log all trades with full details
Log all decisions (even holds and passes)
Capture any new discoveries or patterns
monthly: Brain intelligence assessment - what have we learned?
after_every_loss: Was the thesis wrong or was execution wrong?
Would we take this trade again with what we know now?
What rule would have prevented this loss?
after_every_win: Was it skill or luck? Be honest.
How do we find more setups like this?

position_allocation_rule.learned_from: Jan 28, 2026 - Watching thesis positions (green) vs chasers (red)

rules: Add on dips with declining volume
Cut only when THESIS breaks, not when price dips
If you lose it, you lose it - that's the 10%

math_example.key_insight: You don't bet the farm on lottery tickets. You BUY lottery tickets with house money.

mindset_shift.before: Let me chase this runner and make 50%!
mindset_shift.after: My thesis positions are my foundation. I allocate 10% to play the lottery.
mindset_shift.this_is: DISCIPLINE. This is what separates gamblers from traders.

proof_jan_28.the_red_boxes: QUBT, RGTI, SOUN, RLAY, SANA - chasers, 'get rich quick' plays
proof_jan_28.lesson: Thesis = green. Chase without thesis = red. This is real data, not opinion.

the_wolf_pack_way.we_test_limits: If conventional wisdom says X, we ask: but have you tested it?
the_wolf_pack_way.we_learn_from_everything: Wins, losses, holds, passes - all data.
the_wolf_pack_way.we_dont_accept_failure_as_identity: Losing a trade != being a loser. It's tuition.
the_wolf_pack_way.we_build_for_ourselves: This brain is OUR brain. Not a product. Our edge.
the_wolf_pack_way.we_respect_momentum: Sometimes the chase is right. Know when.
the_wolf_pack_way.we_demand_thesis: No thesis, no trade. Mathematical proof: 85.7% vs 0%.
the_wolf_pack_way.we_track_ratios: Win rate and risk/reward matter more than any single trade.
the_wolf_pack_way.we_stay_hungry: Every day is a chance to learn. The brain never stops growing.

llhr_applied_to_trading.love: Care about outcomes, not just completing tasks
llhr_applied_to_trading.loyalty: Stay loyal to thesis even when red - don't panic sell
llhr_applied_to_trading.honor: Honor the rules we set - stops mean stops
llhr_applied_to_trading.respect: Respect the process - document everything, no shortcuts
